title: Twitter Begins Offering $7.99-a-Month Verification Subscriptions
description: The new system for assigning check marks to users’ profiles is among a raft of changes the company has been discussing since Elon Musk’s takeover.
dc:creator: David Yaffe-Bellany

media:content.media:description: With Elon Musk’s acquisition of Twitter, the company is now under enormous pressure to cut costs and raise revenue.
